amendment.description: Amendment sought to specify that program activities address toxicological studies and environmental impact studies as nanotechnology is developed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered one printed in the Congressional Record of May 6, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bell amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 214 (Roll no. 165).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bell.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bell amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 214 (Roll no. 165).
